channel.title: Need help for batscape --runserver.bat
channel.description: i downloaded batscape source/client now i made classpath and path..changed ip but when i got to source it tells me :::Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Can plz some 1 help to fix this so i can play whit my friend.

item.title: Need help for batscape --runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

i downloaded batscape source/client now i made classpath and path…changed ip but when i got to source it tells me :::Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Can plz some 1 help to fix this so i can play whit my friend.

Read full topic
